Description_lang: Pillar of Frost grants you Remorseless Winter and increases its damage by $51271s5% and its radius by $51271s6%, but your movement speed is heavily reduced for its duration.Pillar of Frost's cooldown is increased by ${$s2/1000} sec.

description_blz.en_US:
Pillar of Frost grants you Remorseless Winter and increases its damage by 400% and its radius by 150%, but your movement speed is heavily reduced for its duration.

Pillar of Frost's cooldown is increased by 15 sec.
description_blz.es_MX:
Pilar de escarcha te otorga Invierno sin remordimientos y aumenta su daño un 400% y su radio un 150%, pero reduce considerablemente tu velocidad de movimiento mientras dura.

El tiempo de reutilización de Pilar de escarcha aumenta 15 s.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Pilar de Gelo concede Inverno Impiedoso e aumenta em 400% o dano e em 150% o raio dessa habilidade, mas a velocidade de movimento é severamente reduzida enquanto durar o efeito.

A recarga de Pilar de Gelo é aumentada em 15 s.
description_blz.de_DE:
Eure 'Säule des Frosts' gewährt Euch 'Unbarmherziger Winter', erhöht seinen Schaden um 400% und seinen Radius um 150%, aber Eure Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit ist für die Effektdauer stark verringert.

Die Abklingzeit von 'Säule des Frosts' wird um 15 Sek. erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB:
Pillar of Frost grants you Remorseless Winter and increases its damage by 400% and its radius by 150%, but your movement speed is heavily reduced for its duration.

Pillar of Frost's cooldown is increased by 15 sec.
description_blz.es_ES:
Pilar de Escarcha otorga Invierno sin remordimientos y aumenta un 400% su daño y un 150% su radio, pero tu velocidad de movimiento disminuye mucho mientras dura.

Aumenta 15 s el tiempo de reutilización de Pilar de Escarcha.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Pilier de givre vous confère Hiver impitoyable et augmente ses dégâts de 400 % et son rayon de 150 %, mais votre vitesse de déplacement est grandement réduite pendant sa durée.

Le temps de recharge de Pilier de givre est augmenté de 15 s.
description_blz.it_IT:
Pilastro di Ghiaccio fornisce Inverno Spietato, aumentandone i danni inflitti del 400% e la portata del 150%, ma riduce significativamente la velocità di movimento per tutta la sua durata.

Aumenta il tempo di recupero di Pilastro di Ghiaccio di 15 s.
description_blz.ru_RU:
"Ледяной столп" дает "Беспощадность зимы" и увеличивает ее урон на 400%, а радиус действия – на 150%, но сильно снижает вашу скорость передвижения, пока она действует.

Время восстановления "Ледяного столпа" повышается на 15 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR:
얼음 기둥 시전 시 냉혹한 겨울이 부여되고 공격력은 400%만큼, 반경은 150%만큼 증가합니다. 하지만 지속시간 동안 이동 속도가 크게 감소합니다.

얼음 기둥의 재사용 대기시간이 15초만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
冰霜之柱賦予你冷酷凜冬，使其傷害提高400%且範圍提高150%，但在其持續時間內，你的移動速度大幅降低。

冰霜之柱的冷卻時間延長15秒。
description_blz.zh_CN:
冰霜之柱使你获得冷酷严冬，并使其伤害提高400%，范围扩大150%，但其持续期间你的移动速度大幅降低。

冰霜之柱的冷却时间延长15秒。
